summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganGive BackDIBS Beauty's Go To Glossy Balm delivers non-sticky shine and a kiss of iridescence, with ultra-fine shimmer for a pearl-like finish in just one swipe.
details: DetailsFeaturesUltra-fine shimmerFull-bodied, balm-like cushiony textureEnriched with ultra-hydrating, antioxidant-rich organic cherry kernel oilLight vanilla scentFor usage on lipsSafe for sensitive skinAllergy- and dermatologist-testedAvailable in eight juicy versatile shadesKey IngredientsCherry Kernel Oil: Nourishes, protects, and softens lipsVanillin: Signature scentFormulated WithoutParabensSulfatesPhthalatesGlutenItem 2636501How To UseSwipe on au naturel lips for moisture-locking comfort and shine, or layer generously over lip liner for the ultimate glaze.IngredientsEffortless Pink : Phytosteryl/Isostearyl/Cetyl/Stearyl/Behenyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Diisostearyl Malate, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Ceresin, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Caprylyl Glycol, Vanillin, Prunus Cerasus (Bitter Cherry) Seed Oil, Ethylhexylglycerin, Tin Oxide, Tocopherol. May ContaIn: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77492), Iron Oxides (CI 77499), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Swipe on au naturel lips for moisture-locking comfort and shine, or layer generously over lip liner for the ultimate glaze.

reviews.headline: Best lip gloss I've ever had
reviews.comments: I've never had a lip gloss with such vibrant color. Not too bright; just the perfect touch of color I was looking for. My new favorite.

reviews.headline: Not sticky at all
reviews.comments: A lot of lip glosses and balms are sticky and just feel weird on my lips, but I absolutely love this lip balm. It is not sticky at all and the colors are beautiful.

reviews.headline: Yes love that it smells good and is so glossy.
reviews.comments: I saw this on tik tok and had to give her a try I love a good lip combo and the Italian soda was the perfect pink gloss finish touch.

reviews.headline: Gorgeous!!!
reviews.comments: This was the gloss I used for prom this year, and I was OBSESSED! Perfect amount of sparkle and lasts a while. also has a ton of pigment if you want something bolder!

reviews.headline: I would buy this again and over again!
reviews.comments: 10/10!! Something about the shimmer in this product is very unique - it is glossy but not glittery. I have this in three colors and am considering getting more. They are my favorite lip glosses of this year. Italian Soda is a perfect cool-toned pink even for my beige skin. I would say Kiss me more is a bit lighter than I expected but still pretty for a peachy nude day.

reviews.headline: I want them all
reviews.comments: I can't explain it but I need all of the shades. I bought Effortless Pink and it compliments my light-tan skin. I have a feeling these shades look good on everyone. Not sticky but shiny. 10/19

reviews.headline: My fav
reviews.comments: The best lip gloss I've bought in a LONG time! It's not super sticky & last. Its a beautiful neutral color.

reviews.headline: I've tried them allâ€¦
reviews.comments: I've tried every lip product under the sun and this in Effortless Pink has blown them all out of the water! It goes on so smooth, isnt sticky at all, has the prettiest color and lasts!! Doesnt have that weird smell or taste as a lot of lip products do either. Definitely recommend this gloss!

reviews.headline: Must have lippie!
reviews.comments: I purchased this glossy balm in Effortless Pink and it is gorgeous! I hate glosses, they are too thick and sticky for me and I just don't feel like I have much control over how my lips look after I apply it, and always feel like I have to keep checking how it looks. This is a liquid balm, in the cutest shade of pink, with a delicious vanilla scent, and looks and stays absolutely beautiful. I always use balms and this just takes it to the next natural level with cute color and a nice shine. Once applied, the thick texture disappears and just lays down perfectly on the lips giving a nice plumped look. I bought this with my own money and i am so excited to keep using this theough the spring and summer! Highly recommend!! Good job Dibs!!

reviews.headline: My new go-to!
reviews.comments: I've wanted to try this for ages & am so excited that Ulta has expanded on the Dibs products that they're carrying. A little of this product goes a long way so while it's a bit pricey, 1 tube will last a ling time. I got Italian Soda & it's the perfect pink shade. Excited to try other shades as well.

faceoff_positive.comments: I purchased this glossy balm in Effortless Pink and it is gorgeous! I hate glosses, they are too thick and sticky for me and I just don't feel like I have much control over how my lips look after I apply it, and always feel like I have to keep checking how it looks. This is a liquid balm, in the cutest shade of pink, with a delicious vanilla scent, and looks and stays absolutely beautiful. I always use balms and this just takes it to the next natural level with cute color and a nice shine. Once applied, the thick texture disappears and just lays down perfectly on the lips giving a nice plumped look. I bought this with my own money and i am so excited to keep using this theough the spring and summer! Highly recommend!! Good job Dibs!!
faceoff_positive.headline: Must have lippie!

faceoff_negative.comments: I got this in the color Soda Pop and I absolutely love the color and shimmer! The formula feels pretty good on the lips but is it supposed to be super thick? It makes it hard to pull out and put back in the applicator and the color can look a bit patchy when you rub your lips together. You can see in the photo that the gloss is so thick, it stays in this stiff chunk on the applicator. Wondering if the thick formula is normal or if I got a bad batch?
faceoff_negative.headline: Formula is super thick but beautiful color
